titles: The loves of Clitophon and Leucippe A most elegant history, written in Greeke by Achilles Tatius: and now Englished.
author: Achilles Tatius.
Hodges, Anthony, 1613 or 14-1686.
publisher: Printed by William Turner for Iohn Allam,
notes: Translation by Anthony Hodges of: Leucippe and Cleitophon.
With an additional title page, engraved.
Running title reads: Clitophon and Leucippe their loves.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
